content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with a current status of EntityStatus.WORKING and a fuel inventory containing 7 units of coal. It has a furnace source of 49 units of copper ore and a furnace result of 67 units of iron plates.

### Wooden chests
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 1.5)) with an inventory containing 50 units of iron plates.
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 3.5)) with an inventory containing 50 units of iron plates.
- Wooden chest (position (3.5, 5.5)) with an empty inventory.

### Copper ore patch at position (-28.5, -61.5)
This is a resource location where the agent has harvested copper ore.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Ensure you have enough copper plates before attempting to craft Automation Science Packs. Regularly check your inventory and production status.

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Make sure to check the current status of the furnace before inserting items. If the furnace is full or not operational, it will not accept more items.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Ensure you are positioned correctly to harvest resources from the target patch. Move closer to the resource patch if necessary.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
